website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Print Run 3.0 was generally well-received by those who have tested it. This road shoe gained favor from neutral pronators who liked a lightweight and visually endearing companion for their activities. On the other hand, there were minor complaints like an inconsistent sizing scheme and stiffness to the midsole.
pros: Many people thought that the Reebok Print Run 3.0 had a visually appealing design
Several consumers commended the lightweight nature of this running shoe
The upper unit was appreciated because it felt agreeable as it wrapped around the foot
‘Comfortable’ was a word that was used when wearing this product
People used this running shoe for casual walking, and they stated that it remained highly functional through such activities
The lightweight nature of the materials was welcomed by runners
cons: The toe box was a bit narrow for some wearers
A consumer complained that the underfoot platform was stiff

customer_reviews.title: You will Love them!
customer_reviews.text: We are a Reebok family now! After being severely disappointed by SEVERAL pairs of Nike, I specifically went in search of another brand. I ended up finding some great deals at a Reebok outlet with no illusions about the quality we'd get there. I purchased a pair for each of my 4 boys and have been blown away by their durability! These look great, are comfortable, and have held up well. The price was unbeatable! Will only buy Reeboks for my boys from now on!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaJoy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very light weight that fits great. My knees do not allow me to run any more but I do a lot of walking instead and these shoes are great for that. I assume they are good for running too I just cannot run any longer. When I wear these shoes out, which is usually in a little over a year I will be ordering a new pair immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Texoma Life

customer_reviews.title: Feel good right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: **I am a treadmill runner** I love the way these shoes fit and I love how comfortable they are. Some shoes you can't tell if they are going to break in and become comfortable. These Reeboks feel great right away. They are light, well made and they look cool. I'm going to wear them around for a day two casually before I wear them on a run. My current running shoe is Brooks Launch 3 which I love but they are getting worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R.

customer_reviews.title: Look really nice but not good for running distance
customer_reviews.text: I run a 5K everyday and usually wear Saucony running shoes. Tried Reebok running shoes the first time. These are fine for 2 miles at a go and then you can feel it in your hips and back. I will use them for running speed miles I guess and not for my 5Ks. I have got compliments though from random people when I have just worn them around - they do look good.
customer_reviews.author: Mukul Krishna

customer_reviews.title: 2 months and shoes are worn out
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as replacements to my Nike Flex running shoes. Not eve two months later, the shoes are worn out, one sole has a hole in it, the other almost worn through. The fit was good, very lightweight, but absolutely no durability. I wore these to walk every day 1.5 miles and jog 3 times a week, also 1.5 miles. All on the roads of my neighborhood. They would be good casual shoes, but they are not a good running or walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: L. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shows for my dad. He walks / runs approx 2 miles on average a day and prefers light weight shoes with comfortable and soft soles. After lot of research and trying multiple shoes, I decided to give a shot to this one and I can tell that it was a wise decision. These pair is perfect for daily jog or run and provides extra comfort. My dad use to complain about foot pain with previous shoes but he is very happy with this one. Moreover it also look trendy yet simple at the same time. You cannot go wrong with the price they come for and i highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Rajen Sarda

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The only reason comfort is at a 4 instead of 5 is my own fault really. I sometimes use these during my workouts, which is not running as they are intended, and my feet start to hurt towards the end. Other than that they are extreamly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: B- with pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoe, bought to match clothes and keep just for that. Not the most comfortable shoe in price range. But just might need to be broken in. Seems a bit stiff. Design is nice, received compliments, and fits for what I purchased for therefore 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and light. No issues and exactly what I expected. They fit but they are just a little long in the toe. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: porte8a2

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, very lightweight and sturdy. I got a pair of Nikes that were giving me blisters when running over 2 miles, replaced them with these and no blisters! Soles are not the most supportive, which is what you expect in a lighter shoe, so don’t wear them if you have to stand a lot.
customer_reviews.author: jmill

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get these for about 15 bucks they fit perfectly and are super comfortable very happy with his shoes just need to go in and get out running
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jagger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: feels a bit light as if the material would not last long. Very canvasy if you get my drift. Very happy tho
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Small

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers, love the color, love the fit, very comfortable, and very light!
customer_reviews.author: Dfarrow

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are comfortable and fit great
customer_reviews.author: Joey Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice!
customer_reviews.text: The price was unbelievable and hubs wears them every day. VERY nice!
customer_reviews.author: KHawk1

customer_reviews.title: Fit really well
customer_reviews.text: Reeboks are the best they fit like a glove right out over the box.
customer_reviews.author: hunterc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are true to size. And excellent quality. The sole is strong and flexible, shoes are very light as well
customer_reviews.author: Ray r

customer_reviews.title: lightweight,
customer_reviews.text: My new go to shoe for work, lightweight, good looking, fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: GLENN NASTI

customer_reviews.title: Not endorsed by any athlete, yay
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, comfortable, not endorsed by any jackass, I like that the tongue is not well thought out though, just doesn't stay in place very well and has to be pushed down on the side that is unattached
customer_reviews.author: andrew laymon

customer_reviews.title: Super lite! Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look and fit. These are the lightest shoes I've had. Almost like your barefoot. Going to buy another pair in red.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: I got the red ones and they shimmer. They fit good enough and look sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Arley Morton

customer_reviews.title: They are one of the best shoes I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: They are one of the best shoes I have ever bought. So lightweight and comfortable. Can’t tell you even have them on, except for the comfort. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Only shoes my husband will wear! He loves Reebok. We always order a size larger in Reebok. Normal size is a 12, we order a 13.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Fits well for 12w.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Took a few days to break in but fits well for a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: chu

customer_reviews.title: All day comfort and ease of wearability
customer_reviews.text: The comfortability of these shoes is top notch. I can wear them all day and feel comfortable that my feet will not hurt. The only knock on these are the laces. They dont hold a knot unless it doubled and somedays that's just a pain
customer_reviews.author: Twich

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Sons favorite pair of shoes ever. Lasted longer then expected
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband at a steep discount. He loves them! Couldn't be happier. He isn't a fan of sneakers typically but these are nice to wear with jeans and with shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best tennis shoes I’ve ever had. I use them for work, on my feet all day. They are very comfortable! I wouldn’t use them to work out in.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Reebok stepped its game up with these shoes. The design is very sleek and the cost is just right. The shoes fit perfectly and arr very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight/Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I looooove them. I hate anything on my feet and shoes are the first to come off, especially bulky or constrained. But these shoes are so lightweight, comfortable and hardly feels like there's anything on my feet. I will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FLuFF

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Gym Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby. He loves wearing them to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Missy J Knows LLC

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: My husbands running shoes had worn down and needed replacing. These shoes I got him were true to size and felt very light on his feet while running. They are so comfortable and stylish too that he wants to wear them around casually as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Shoe for running or walking around
customer_reviews.text: It looked better in the picture than when I saw it in person
customer_reviews.author: John Butler

customer_reviews.title: Feels good on the feet.
customer_reviews.text: Its comfy, light, and stretchy. Fit just right. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Lsan85

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat these shoes for the price. Comfortable also.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Size Chart
customer_reviews.text: i know my size. but when i looked at the size chart it said something else. so i followed the size chart provided by amazon, and it came a bit larger than i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alaa

customer_reviews.title: Really like my shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great choose I like the design, only complaint is that they squeak on slick surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Q

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad and he loved them. He said they fit perfectly and are very comfy. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Pena

customer_reviews.title: The cost was excellent, affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe a better design. I use the shoe for show to go with my sweatsuit it’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bogier

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend Reebok Men's Print Run 3.0 Shoe to anyone looking for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, low price, came quick. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Maxirino

customer_reviews.title: Great quality training sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Very light and very flexible. I love it!!. Perfect for my training
customer_reviews.author: Ramy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, light and very comfortable. Fit as expected and look fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Senterfitt

customer_reviews.title: Accurate fitting and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Reebok has always been my favorite and this time too they didn’t let me down. Amazing fitting, super comfortable in running (gifted it to my son-in-law)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Reebok Mens Print Run 3.0 Fabric Low Top Lace Up Running Sneaker
product_meta.description: The Reebok® Print Run 3.0 shoe combines precise underfoot cushioning with a strong structure for a durable and locked in feel for training and versatile athletic usage. Best for: Running versatility, 5Ks, and speed workouts. Seamless Flexweave™ and stretchy mesh upper for lightweight, breathable support. Low-cut design for freedom of motion and quicker transitions. 3-D foam midsole with footprint mapping for adaptive, precise cushioning. Carbon rubber rim under the toe and heel for strategic traction. Durable synthetic outsole with adaptive lugs on the bottom flex to match the foot's natural movement. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 8.2 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
